function.name: camera_show
function.description: This function is used to display video feed from a specified camera or a camera built into a smart home device.

location.description: The location where the camera is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the camera is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device with the camera. e.g. Refrigerator, etc.
